testimonials.text1: I requested a landing page for my company, the service was fast and well done, I would like to congratulate Yago for an excellent job.
testimonials.text2: I highly recommend, affordable prices, excellent service and clarification of doubts. Only Success!
testimonials.text3: Contract respecting all criteria, knew how to extract well the need I had to improve the prospecting of my business, I highly recommend.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer passionate about technology and innovation
about.description: I'm a Full Stack developer with over 3 years of experience creating modern and efficient web solutions. Specialized in React, Node.js and emerging technologies.

telegas.title: TeleGás Monte Verde
telegas.subtitle: Commercial Landing Page
telegas.description: I developed a modern and responsive landing page for a gas distributor in Betim-MG. I implemented an integrated contact form, service sections and SEO optimization to increase the company's online visibility.

togyro.title: Togyro Group Victory
togyro.subtitle: Corporate Portfolio
togyro.description: I created an institutional website with futuristic design for a technology company. I used smooth animations, responsive design and a clean and scalable code architecture.

kypy.title: Kypy Health
kypy.subtitle: Clinic Landing Page
kypy.description: I developed a platform focused on health and wellness for Kypy clinic. The site includes online scheduling, treatment information and a blog section for health tips.

ecosempre.title: EcoSempre Project
ecosempre.subtitle: Environmental Platform
ecosempre.description: I created an educational website about proper disposal of electronic waste. I implemented interactive sections, recycling information and collection points, focusing on environmental awareness.

teamblack.title: TeamBlack
teamblack.subtitle: Educational Site
teamblack.description: I developed an institutional website for a teacher, with professional design, course gallery, student testimonials and social media integration.

todolist.title: To-Do List
todolist.subtitle: Web Application
todolist.description: I developed a complete task management application with functionalities to add, edit, mark as completed and delete tasks. Unique space design with data persistence in localStorage.

gt.title: GT Personal Trainer
gt.subtitle: Fitness Site
gt.description: I created a professional website for personal trainer with workout sections, testimonials, training plans and contact form. Motivational design focused on lead conversion.

phbytes.title: Ph Bytes
phbytes.subtitle: Technology Portfolio
phbytes.description: I developed an institutional website for a technology company with modern design, service sections, project portfolio and integrated contact form.

bodegueira.title: Bodegueira Charcutaria & Cia
bodegueira.subtitle: Food E-commerce
bodegueira.description: I created a complete delivery website for the bodegueira promoting the sales of their products in Brasília. I implemented shopping cart, order system, WhatsApp integration and conversion-focused design.

lacos.title: Laços e Confeitos
lacos.subtitle: Confectionery Site
lacos.description: I developed an elegant website for culinary atelier specialized in fine sweets. Product gallery, quote form and sophisticated design that conveys product quality.

raha.title: Raha Health and Aesthetics
raha.subtitle: Clinic Site
raha.description: I created a professional website for health and aesthetics clinic. Service sections, treatment gallery, online scheduling and clean design that conveys trust and professionalism.

vivacqua.title: Vivacqua Dentistry
vivacqua.subtitle: Corporate Website
vivacqua.description: I developed a modern corporate website for a dental clinic. I implemented semantic HTML for better SEO, responsive design with Tailwind CSS and interactive functionalities with JavaScript, prioritizing accessibility and performance.

upcoming.title: New Projects
upcoming.subtitle: Under Development
upcoming.description: I am constantly developing new projects and learning new technologies. Soon, more amazing work will be available here!
